EmailTemplate.name: Last Login 60 Days HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: 60 Days of Salesforce.com Inactivity - Please Login
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!uf__User_Status__c.uf__User__c},
You have not logged into Salesforce.com in 60 days. Your manager has been notified and your account will be disabled.
If your access is needed please login to Salesforce.com immediately. https://cargill18.my.salesforce.com/{!uf__User_Status__c.Id}
You may request your account to be reactivated by using the helpdesk form below: http://helpdesk.cargill.com/SubmitTicket.aspx?id=2401
